title: How to Find the Trophy Room in Sonic Generations

steps.headline: Go to the collection room (where you view your movies, pictures and music).
Hold the back button (for Xbox users) select (for PS3 users) and hold for 5-7 seconds.
Enter a room with golden floors and walls.

text: Go to the collection room (where you view your movies, pictures and music).  Hold the back button (for Xbox users) select (for PS3 users) and hold for 5-7 seconds.  Enter a room with golden floors and walls.
